data.name: fwk.setIteration
data.description: Define an interation that can be used in any next action

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the iteration to define

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of iteration that will be performed

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: Identifier for the list name that is used to iterate on

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: Value to use for incrementing or decrementing the iteration

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: Condition to apply for the iteration

parameters.name: interrupt
parameters.description: Define if an iteration needs to break if an error inside occurs
